article: During one of the toughest weeks of my life, I had the chance to experience surprising grace . I was in my office, when a young man came by. He was obviously very _ and close to tears. I just sat there while he sobbed. "I think she might die," he gasped . "What am I going to do?" It was clear to me that he had never _ this fear out loud to anyone. I just sat there, fully focused on him and his _ , and tried to offer some soft words of _ . After quite some time, he _ himself. I reassured him again that it didn't matter to me when he took his exam and that I would help him through. Then he left. Afterwards, I felt like his _ was a blessing . Being able to help him while I was in pain myself was the most valuable gift. Life never gives more than we can handle.
